ee adhikarana niyoga matha pitatha samajayen bandhanagara wetha paminena korona aasaditha nawa sakakaruwan saha nawa sirakaruwangen danata bandhanagaragathawa sitina randawiyan aaraksha kara ganime aramunin.bandhanagara thula pawathina thadabadaya awama kirime nirdeshayan lesada nawa margopadesha malawa nikuth kara athi bawayi bandhanagara kalamanakarana ha sirakaruwan punaruththapana katayuthu rajya amathyanshaya sandahan kale.ee anuwa, heroyin sambandhawa nadu pawarimedi apa laba dima sadaha wana heroyin gram 02 kata wada aduwana awasthawanta adala kandayata amatharawa heroyin gram 02 th 04th athara awasthawanta adalawa nawa kandayak handunwadima sudusu bawa nithipathawaraya wisin polispathiwaraya wetha danum di thibenawa.ehi dakwenne wimarshanayedi anawaranaya wana karunu anuwa heroyin gram 02 th 04th athara kandaye sakakaruwanta masa 03 k athulatha apa laba dima sambandhayen wiruddha nowana bawata adala mahesthrath adhikaranayan danuwath kala yuthu bawayi.heroyin mathdrawya panayata abbahiwuwan saha heroyin gram 1 kata adu pramanak athi awasthawaladi adhikaranayata karunu wartha kirima magin ema pudgalayan bandhanagaraga thulata yomuwima walakwaliya haki bawada nithipathiwaraya nikuth kala margopadeshawala sandahan.emenma, wasaraka sira danduwamakin danduwam kala haki waradi sambandhayen sakakaruwan adhikaranayata idiripath karanu labana mul awasthawedima suwishesha karunak nomathi nam apa labadimata wiruddha nowana bawa adhikaranayata wartha kalayuthu bawata da nithipathiwaraya wisin polispathiwaraya wetha danum di thibenawa.

karathe hewath hisath satankramaye piya lesa tho de sakugawa wirudawali labayi.methumage pradhana sisuwa wana sokon mansumura nam wishishta shilpiya sakugawathumage satan sampradaya thawaduratath shakthimathkara shuri sampradaya shakthimath kaleya. 1851upatha lada kanriyo higashi onka nam shilpiya china satan kramawala aabhashaya matha mrudu chalana saha shwasana abhyasa sahithawa nahapradeshikayaaasha rithawa"naha"sampradaya godanaguweya.1888upathalada chojun miyagi methumage pradhana sisuwa wiya.miyagithuma"raluhamruudubawemaga"lesahandunwana"gojuriyu"shailiyehi nirmathruuwarayayi.ko su wathsumura nam shilpiya thomaripradeshaya aashrithawa bihi wu"thomari the" sampradaye aarambhakaya wiya.mekala tho dehewath karathe satan kalawa shuri ha thomari pradeshayanta anuwa bedithibuni.shurithe saha thomarithe sampradayan ekwi sokon mansumuradamu padanama matha shorin riyu shailiya bihiwuni."payinwananthara shailiya"yana arutha dena shorin riyu lowa purama karathe shailiya wiya.ee anuwa lowa prathama karathe shailiya lesa shorin riyu shailiya wada wadagathkamak usulayi.
